mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Product (category_id, name, brand, price, sale_price, quantity, volume) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{brand}, #{price}, #{salePrice}, #{quantity}, #{volume})
mapper.update: UPDATE Product SET category_id=#{product.categoryId}, name=#{product.name}, brand=#{product.brand}, price=#{product.price}, sale_price=#{product.salePrice}, quantity=#{product.quantity}, volume=#{product.volume} WHERE id=#{requestId}
